verses.1: Sanggamte aw, mite tungah thu a hilh eite pen midangte sangin a khauh zaw-in thu hong kikhen ding ahih manin note tampi sia na suak nuam se kei un.
verses.2: Eite khempeuh a khial thei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna ah a khial ngei lo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a uk zo mi ahi hi.
verses.3: Sakol in i thu hong man theih nadingin kamkaih i bulh a, a sakol pumpi buppi i uk zo hi.
verses.4: Teembawte ngaihsun dih un. Teembaw lian mahmah a, huihpi in nakpi takin a mut hangin a hawl paʼ deihna bangin a heina neu khat tawh ki-uk zo hi.
verses.5: Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hi napi-in thusia lian pipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kaang tum thei hi.
verses.6: Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hi napi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suah thei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kaang tumsak thei hi.
verses.7: Mihingte in gamsa, vasa, a bokvak ganhing le tui sunga om ngasate a kipan ganhing khempeuh zualsakin uk zo uh hi.
verses.8: Ahi zongin siattheih nading gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong thei lo leii pen zualsakin a uk zo kuamah om lo hi.
verses.9: I leii tawh eiteʼ pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi.
verses.10: Kam khat sung panin thupha le thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi het lo hi.
verses.11: Tuinak khat panin tui lim le tui lim lo hong luang khia khawm thei ahi hiam?
verses.12: Sanggamte aw, theikung in oliv hong gah thei a, leenggui in thei pum hong gah thei ahi hiam? Tui-al in tuilim piangsak ngei lo hi.
verses.13: Note lakah pilin thu thei a kisa a om leh kiniamkhiatin pilin, nuntak hoih le gamtat hoih tawh a lahkhiat ding ahi hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin na lungsim uh ah enna, gitlohna le huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialh nading bangmah om lo hi.
verses.15: Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hi lo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisai lo, a dawivai ahi hi.
verses.16: Enna le huaihamna a om nakleh buaina le siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
verses.17: Ahi zongin tung lam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho ahi hi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-et lo a, kineihkhem cihte om lo hi.
verses.18: Kilemna a piangsak mite in lungnuam takin a tuh khaici in hoihna le dikna a piangsak hi.
